CustomField.description:
This field defines the method used to set the external ID string for the Payee Allowance object.
Valid options are: - Payee and Name (Default) - Payee Assignment and Name
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
This field defines the method used to set the external ID string for the Payee Allowance object.
Valid options are: - Payee and Name (Default) - Payee Assignment and Name
CustomField.label: External ID Payee Allowance
